snippet: The Washington Wizards are the only team in the N.B.A. without a victory.
abstract: The Washington Wizards are the only team in the N.B.A. without a victory.
lead_paragraph: The Washington Wizards, thanks to a terrible 0-8 start to the season, are the N.B.A.'s worst team right now, and the only club without a victory in the shortened season. The Wizards are 7.5 games in back of the Southeast Division and Eastern Conference-leading Miami Heat (8-1) and digging in at the bottom.

headline.main: Wizards Sinking Fast in the East
